text: Philippe Morenvillier (born December 6, 1965 in Nancy) is a French politician, former member of the National Assembly of France. He represented the Meurthe- et-Moselle department,http://www.assemblee- nationale.fr/13/tribun/fiches_id/343385.asp as a member of the Union for a Popular Movement. == Biography == He joined the party Debout la France in April 2019, explaining his departure from les Republicans by the refusal of Nadine Morano to support him during the general elections and believing that the party became "a drunken boat, left by the figureheads". He is currently National Delegate to Small and Medium Enterprises. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:People from Nancy, France Category:Politicians from Grand Est Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Debout la France politicians
title: Philippe Morenvillier
